action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the "Client Meeting: Fujitsu" entry.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows a calendar application open on a computer. The calendar is set to week view, displaying the dates from November 11th to 17th, 2024. The current date, Saturday, November 16th, is highlighted. The location is set to New York, NY, with the weather displayed as 10°C. Two meetings are scheduled for Saturday: one labeled "Client Meeting: Fujitsu" and another labeled "Important Meeting with Boss".
action.program_description: A calendar application displaying the week\'s schedule.
